example_sentence_english: The smell of the bread is delightful.
I add butter to the bread.
I remove the crust from the bread.
A wonderful smell comes from the warm loaves.
There are raisins in the bread.
They put seeds in the breads.
I spread jam on the bread.
I spray water on the loaves.
I serve cheese with the bread.
They work with the freshly baked loaves.
